channel.title: Rapidshare no count down waiting working
channel.description:
i know ever one hates Rapidshare for the limit and count thing but the limited all u need is a proxy and for count you can do this "[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QDnAqVar3-k]Video how to and showing that it works[/url]
You need Firefox ......and Greasemonkey then you install [url=http://userscripts.org/scripts/source/1919.user.js]this script[/url] and then it work that is it
Pm me if u want site for unlimited download to Megaupload and Rapidshare if u want me to remove it pm me and i will. "if i can post site with out getting in trouble please pm me" sometimeit doesn't work it normal does
[b]Ron: No talking of Rep. Not my rule, it's Mopar's.[/b]
